name: AffirmationsDaily
0:
”Alexa, open Affirmations Daily.”
”Alexa, open Affirmations Daily and inspire me.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: affirmations daily
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Affirmations Daily skill energizes your mind, body, and soul with powerful, positive affirmations daily. Feeling down? Lacking motivation? Harness the power of positive thinking. Keep your thoughts in check. Ask Alexa to inspire you with an affirmation to positively realign your thoughts throughout the day. The power of positive thinking has not only been shown to improve your mood but provides the motivation to attract the things you desire in life. To get started, enable the Affirmations Daily skill. Tell Alexa, "inspire me" to hear a new affirmation! Tell Alexa, "repeat" to repeat a positive affirmation. Say "goodbye" to exit the skill. For more visit jamesvalles.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
